body.name: Under Cabinet Lighting,2pack 13inch 56LED Motion Sensor Light indoor,USB Rechargeable Under Cabinet Lights,Stick-On Magnetic Closet Lights,DiDiSky 4 Modes led Lights for Room Kitchen Wardrobe Counter
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 28 mins
features: 💡【Bright and Eye-Friendly with Adjustable Brightness】 Under cabinet lighting is equipped with 56 LED lamp beads, side-illuminated, the light is refracted to the light guide plate through the reflector, and then evenly distributed on the light surface through the diffusion plate, with a brightness of up to 162 lumens and a wide illumination coverage area. The light is bright, soft and gradual, giving the human eye a short buffer time, effectively protecting both eyes from strong light.The Brightness Adjustment button toggles the brightness between 50%, 75%, and 100%, and a long press adjusts the brightness from 10%-100%

💡【Motion Sensor Lights, 4 function modes】Equipped with infrared sensor and light sensor, once someone enters the detection range (distance: 10 feet, angle: 120°), the light will come on immediately and gradually turn off after the person leaves the detection range after 20 seconds. On Mode for continuous illumination, ☼ Mode for day and night sensing, ☾ Mode for sensing in dark environments only, and Off Mode

💡【Long Battery Life with USB charging】 This under cabinet lighting has a built-in 2200mAh lithium polymer battery that lasts over 90 days. It can work continuously for 9 hours at maximum brightness and more than 60 days in sensor mode (triggered 6 times a day). Adopts USB-C charging interface for faster charging (USB-C cables included) Adapter compatibility

💡【Wide Application and Easy Installication】 The closet light is suitable for bedrooms, nurseries, closets, closets, cabinets, corridors, workshops, basements, garages, stairwells, garage entrance pantries and other places. The led light strip has a built-in magnet and can be stuck to any iron product, use the included tape and iron sheet to fix the light strip

💡【Premium Quality Product & Service Guarantee】The under cabinet light is made of anodized aluminum housing with integrated powerful magnets inside, and the quality is certified by CEC, FCCand RoHs. If you buy our products and encounter any problems during use, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with satisfactory solutions within 24 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are super easy and effective. I had a dark corner cabinet on which I displayed some items. You could only see them during the day! Now these have brightened up the corner beautifully. Easy stick on with magnetic strips. Easy to recharge, two at a time. I am buying two more. Adjustable 3x brightness. Please note these don’t come with remote, but they have a sensor that works well. When I want them to stay on for a long time a just turn them to the on position. Also note the photos were taken during the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and rechargeable
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice portable light bar. The motion detection is very good. The light doesn’t stay on for extended periods, but that helps the battery life too. This light can be manually set to stay on, it’s just that you have to be able to get to the switches to do that. I be started using these motion detection lights in dark kitchen cabinets and they are perfect. They come on quickly when the cabinet is opened and usually you just need that to find what you are looking for and the it turns off. I’ve only had a week, so don’t know how long before I need to recharge, but I’m so glad it don’t have to keep buying batteries. The initial charging (usb-c. Cord included!) seemed reasonable, didn’t take long. Light is more than adequate for a closet or cabinet, maybe an entryway…..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little light!
reviews.reviewText: Great little light and easy to install. It is sensitive to motion even when the room light is on and it's set on nighttime motion. Guess that's not a bad thing. If you are looking for a bright light for a dark place, I recommend this light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy To Install
reviews.reviewText: They have only been up a few days so don't know how well they will stay up without a small screw.The charging cable included is of not use with the lights as they are so short they do not reach any of our outlets. Had to order a longer one from Amazon. The notion detections works very well and they can be adjusted for brightness. Overall we are satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lights work great for lighting up our RV shelves
reviews.reviewText: We purchased these to put under our RV pantry and bathroom shelves. The work great really light up what is in the shelves and make it easy to see what is on the shelf. Since they can be set to to be motion activated no turning them off and on. Having the ability to set different brightness levels is nice for areas that don’t need as much light and saves on battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Install
reviews.reviewText: I liked these so much that I purchased 2 more sets. They seem to work well except for, on occasion, they don't pick up motion until we are almost to them. IR technology, in general, does not work well when being approached head on. It works better when you are going across the zones. However, I am pleased and for the price I recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Battery Life is BIG a Disappointment; Certainly Could Be Brighter; Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I Bought a twin pack of these lights, and after fully charging both lights, installed then under a counter in the kitchen. Using the stick on magnetic mounting method, the install took maybe 5 mins, with half that time used in deciding how to space them. After a few days use, I decided I needed a bit more light at the counter, and bought a second package of two lights.And so now, with four lights covering a 7 foot counter, the light output is perfectly adequate. However, the battery life has not been good. Many reviewers indicated that their lights would run at least a week between chargings. But I'm getting, while using the motion sensor, 2 days battery life...tops. If I forego the motion sensor, manually turning them on and off, I get 2 to 4 days. While they are quick and easy to pull of their magnet mounts and plug into the supplied VERY short dual 8" charging cord, they'll recharge in a pretty fast few hours. But for me, going to the work counter, and having two or more lights running dim of completely dead, is not what I expected at all.Mine are coming down and I'll try moving them into service within a lightly used small pantry room and into a seldom used, but pretty gloomy closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy little light Pair
reviews.reviewText: These stick-up lights are great. I like the fact that they are rechargeable and are held magnetically making it easy to remove, recharge, and replace. Plus there are 2 light bars in the package. I have them located under my kitchen cabinets and they add extra light on my countertop area. The motion sensors are sensitive and even under the kitchen cabinets the lights turn on as I am walking toward them.
